alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:48PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER... SOUTHWESTERN OGLALA LAKOTA...FALL RIVER...CENTRAL CAMPBELL...WESTON AND SOUTHWESTERN CROOK COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM MDT... At 647 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northeast of Powder River Rest Area to 7 miles northeast of Whitney Lake. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gillette, Hot Springs, Newcastle, Pine Ridge, Edgemont, Dewey, Oral, Oelrichs, Smithwick, Provo, Clareton, Echeta, Rozet, Wolf Creek Housing, Argyle, Prairie Winds Casino, Morrisey, Rumford, Calico, and Ardmore. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 97 and 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
